release.action: BeforeStepEvent and AfterStepEvent now returns step.

SuiteIdentifier now injected onto MartiniCallable. Added dependency on ch.qos.cal10n:cal10n-api. Switching MartiniCallable to localized logging. Added interface guru.qas.martini.result.MutableMartiniResult. Class guru.qas.martini.result.DefaultMartiniResult extends ModifiableMartiniResult.

Updating to Java 11. Added ability to shut down a scope from a different thread (expressly for JMeter). Explicitly defining depedency on 5.1.3.RELEASE versioned Spring core and beans libraries. Removing transitively duplicate dependencies from POM. @Steps annotation now takes a name. Logging warning when an unimplemented step is encountered. Martini can now return a list of annotations from StepImplementations. Removing @Gated priority.
Updating to Java 10. Removing MIT license. Updating README.md. Adding gating concept. Correcting scenario destruction callback ordering.
